itunes:title: September Books on the Radar
title: September Books on the Radar
description:
In Episode 15 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are sharing their September Books on the Radar! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, a shelf addition, and have book talk about upcoming September releases they are excited to read.

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!


Loving Lately
5:07 Thrive Brilliant Eye Brightener in Muna (Renee)
7:23 The Glam Life Guru on YouTube , Skincare Obsessions Worth the Hype (Tina)

Latest Reads
10:47 56 Days | Catherine Ryan Howard
Distress Signals | Catherine Ryan Howard
14:15 My Time Will Come | Ian Manuel

Book Talk
Damnation Spring | Ash Davidson
20:40 The Charm Offensive |Alison Cochrun (T)
23:15 L.A. Weather |Maria Amparo Escandon (R)
25:48 The Night She Disappeared |Lisa Jewell (T)
28:13 Harlem Shuffle |Colson Whitehead (R)
31:10 The House on Needless Street| Catriona Ward (T)
32:00 App Kid | Michael Sayman (R)
35:58 Please Don't Sit on My Bed With Your Outside Clothes |Phoebe Robinson (T)
37:36 Once Upon a Broken Heart | Stephanie Garber (R)
The Invisible Life of Addie Larue |VE Schwab (R)


Shelf Additions
40:00 Confessions| Kane Monato (T)
41:09 No One Will Miss Her | Kat Robinson (R)

Love audiobooks like we do? Head to Libro.fm where you can find your next must listen audiobook, gift a membership to someone special, and support your favorite Independent Bookstore! *link is an affiliate in which we earn a small commission at no cost to you


Connect with us on social media! On Instagram, Tina @Tbretc, Renee Â @Itsbooktalk, and the podcast is @booktalketc

You can also email us directly at booktalketc@gmail.com.

Support the show
